title: GO SMS Pro Green Smoke Theme
creator: Themes Architect

extendedInfo.description: Cool GO SMS Pro Theme with green smoke layout. Subtitles main menu text messages are in white. Sms texts are also white, window text messages are transparent with green tone. Application icons for text messages are green and white color. SMS is a green background with motifs of smoke, elements of the background and text SMS in white. Now you can have for free interesting layout with smoke. Download our application, which is its lightness you call down and take the time with the wafting smoke. You do not neet to smoke the fire or cigarettes to have your own smoke. This theme fits great to people who likes marijuana or cigarette. If you like to smoke weed download this skin for free.Requirements:This theme requires GO SMS Pro application installed on your phone. You can download it for free from Google Play typing GO SMS Pro in search field.This theme contains:-  wallpaper shows a mysterious, bright smoke. The background is a wonderful, living green.- changed messages frames, in different shades of green with white letters, easier to read - pop up window is green with the same amazing smokeHow to run our theme:1. Download our GO SMS Pro Green Smoke Theme for free2. Open GO SMS Pro application and press MENU button.3. Choose our Green Smoke Theme and click applyHow to change theme appearance:1. Open GO SMS Pro application and press Menu button.2. Choose Settings.3. From settings tab select Advanced tab.4. Press Appearance Settings5. Set any option of our theme. You can set there:- Conversation List appearance- Conversation appearance- Popup window appearance- Text Font- Reset to default settings.Support - âTHEMES ARCHITECTâ:If you need help with our theme please contact with us on email: themesarchitect@gmail.comOur support works only in the English language. Themes are released regularly so you can find something new every time.Compatibility:Our themes has been tested on the most common smartphone-s offered by manufacturers such as: Samsung, HTC, LG, Sony and Motorola. Our themes works with Android 2.2 and later.
